BUMN Keroyokan Bangun 5 Bali Baru
03 Nov 2019, 12:02 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Dikhy Sasra

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) meminta agar pengembangan 5 destinasi super prioritas alias Bali baru rampung pada akhir 2020. Pengembangan itu seperti pembangunan bandara, pelabuhan dan jalan.Selain itu Jokowi juga ingin adanya perbaikan produk dan pariwisata berbasis rakyat di Bali baru tersebut"Akhir 2020 rampung semua, airport rampung, jalan rampung, pelabuhan rampung, calendar of event rampung," kata Jokowi saat rapat terbatas (ratas) di Istana Presiden beberapa waktu lalu (30/10/2019).Terkait hal tersebut, Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) keroyokan untuk terlibat dalam program tersebut. Salah satunya ialah PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk.Direktur BTN Mahelan Prabantarikso mengatakan, dukungan perseroan terhadap sektor pariwisata ditandai dengan jumlah kredit yang disalurkan kepada sektor tersebut yang mencapai 10% dari total kredit BTN."Program pariwisata ini kan salah satunya adalah hotel dan ini masuk bagian dari properti. Selain itu, BTN banyak membantu merenovasi dan membantu Kredit Usaha Kecil yang sifatnya membangun UMKM berkaitan dengan pariwisata," ujar Mahelan, Minggu (3/11/2019).Mahelan menjelaskan, untuk sektor infrastruktur yang terkait dengan periwisata, BTN juga telah menyalurkan kredit ke PT Angkasa Pura I (Persero) atau AP I dan AP II mencapai sekitar Rp 2 triliun.Jika bandara tersebut jadi maka akan banyak proyek di daerah sekitar yang bisa dibiayai oleh BTN seperti kredit konstruksi hotel ataupun pembangunan home stay. Terlebih, Jokowi ingin pengembangan destinasi wisata bisa mengakomodir kebutuhan ekonomi masyarakat setempat.Menurut Mahelan, banyak ragam yang bisa dilakukan BTN dalam mendukung sektor pariwisata, salah satunya melalui program KPR Mikro dan KPR ABCG."Kita sudah banyak membangun daerah-daerah pariwisata dan model-model kolaborasi komunitas dan juga banyak program-progran lain yang telah dilakukan yang tentunya akan mendorong kehidupan masyarakat lebih baik lagi," tambah dia. BUMN Keroyokan Build 5 Bali Baru
03 Nov 2019, 12:02 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Dikhy Sasra

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) requested that the development of 5 super priority destinations, aka Bali, be completed by the end of 2020. The development is like the construction of airports, ports and roads. In addition, Jokowi also wants improvements in products and people-based tourism in the new Bali "By 2020, everything will be finished, the airport will be completed, the road will be completed, the port will be completed, the calendar of events will be completed," Jokowi said during a limited meeting (ratas) at the Presidential Palace some time ago (10/30/2019). (BUMN) together to get involved in the program. One of them is PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk. BTN Director Mahelan Prabantarikso said the company's support for the tourism sector was marked by the amount of loans extended to the sector which reached 10% of the total BTN credit. "This tourism program is one of them is a hotel and this is part of the property. In addition, BTN has helped to renovate and assist Small Business Loans that are building MSMEs related to tourism, "Mahelan said, Sunday (11/03/2019). Mahelan explained, for the infrastructure sector related to tourism. BTN has also extended credit to PT Angkasa Pura I (Persero) or AP I and AP II, reaching around Rp 2 trillion. If the airport is completed, there will be many projects in the surrounding area that can be financed by BTN such as hotel construction loans or home stay development . Moreover, Jokowi wants the development of tourist destinations to be able to accommodate the economic needs of the local community. According to Mahelan, BTN can do a lot of variety in supporting the tourism sector, one of which is through the Micro KPR program and ABCG KPR program. "the model of community collaboration and also many other programs that have been carried out will certainly encourage people's lives to be better," he added.
